description:
Get ready for an exciting new journey with Hitomi. This time she, as the captain of a spaceship, is sent to explore a mysterious planet.
Collect the puzzle pieces and immerse yourself in the exciting atmosphere of this amazing journey to uncover all the secrets of this exciting story.

The largest number of images in the entire series of games "Hentai Tales".

Features:
• 50 anime style images
• Exciting story
• Relaxing music
• Simple game mechanics
name: Hentai Tales Vol. 3
intro: A new part of exciting puzzles telling about Hitomi's adventures in space.
